p: The shallow water marine habitats of Ningaloo to 20 m depth have been mapped using HyMap airborne hyperspectral imagery at 3.5 m pixel resolution [ 64]. For the deeper water benthic communities, spatial habitat models were constructed using towed video camera imagery of the benthos in depths from 15â€“130 m throughout the marine park captured together with single beam echo-sounder transects [ 65] ( Table 2) (For detailed methods see S2).
